description.lang: This smart plug provides one Z-Wave outlet with power and send out the consumption data for remote controller through Z-Wave gateway for internet of thing service and can be configured in Z-Wave sensor network, if Z-Wave certified controller features remote access, you can now control your device from your mobile phone devices. And get summary data for daily/month power or energy used for this load while installed an App on your mobile. Manual On/Off by push button on front. The outlet has maximum load for 600W Incandescent or 1200W resistive.
